name: pastilla
ingredients: 1 tea glass of durum wheat flour (finot)
Mixture of oil and butter (for layering)
1 L of shrimp broth (reserve the shrimp for another use)
1 can of tuna (preferably in tomato sauce)
1 tablespoon of chopped parsley and coriander
steps: Prepare the msemens dough: Mix the flours and salt, add warm water to form a soft dough. Knead, shape into small balls, coat them with oil, and let rest.
Prepare the filling: Sauté the onion, garlic, chicken, and spices. Add the tomatoes, broth, olives, pickles, preserved lemon, harissa, and tomato paste. Let it cook.
Add the vermicelli and tuna to the filling. Season with salt and pepper. Let cool.
Shape the mini-pastillas with the msemens dough rolled out thinly, brushed with butter/oil, and folded into a square.
Place the mini-pastillas on a baking sheet with parchment paper. Brush with beaten egg.
Bake at 200°C for about 20 minutes or until golden. Decorate and serve hot.
